To determine ESI, 20 µL of each emulsion were mixed with 5 mL of 0.1% SDS solution and vortexed. The absorbance was measured at 500 nm immediately and after 10 min (UV-VIS Evolution 220 spectrophotometer, Thermo-Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA).
